control_attributes.Control: SC-23 (3) UNIQUE SESSION IDENTIFIERS WITH RANDOMIZATION
control_attributes.control_description: The information system generates a unique session identifier for each session with [Assignment: organization-defined randomness requirements] and recognizes only session identifiers that are system-generated.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system includes: [Assignment: organization-defined platform-independent applications].

Control Statement: The information system generates a unique session identifier for each session with [Assignment: organization-defined randomness requirements] and recognizes only session identifiers that are system-generated.
